title: Leek and Onion Vegetable Dip
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together dry onion soup mix, dry leek soup mix, dried dill weed, mayonnaise and sour cream. Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1/2 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix
